overview: Little Nina, oldest daughter of a plantation guard, is rescued by Daniel, a novice priest, from a tiger. As a result, Nina later aspires to be a nun. Meanwhile, the sickly Adri, who is the son of a wealthy businessman, is very much in love with Nina. Nina has to forget her dream when her family becomes poor after her father is accused of corruption, and becomes a drunkard.
title: Not a Seasonal Dream
